nodes.text: Treidum was a freighter owner who was a subscriber to, and commenter on, Cynabar's Droid Datalog. In 1 BBY, Treidum ran a load of Roche Siak Protocol Droids out to the planet Derilyn in the Elrood sector. There, the smuggler was jumped by pirates, most likely the Khuiumin Survivors whom Platt Okeefe later warned were operating in the area. Treidum survived the pirate attack, and on returning to Berchest, posted a warning to other smugglers about the area. The warning was included in the next version of Cynabar's Droid Datalog.

Several months later, Treidum commented on the entry for the WED15-D3, stating that they had retrofitted their Treadwell droid with a repair database and six more manipulator arms. The modifications allowed the droid to repair Treidum's freighter faster.
